landing.hero_subtitle: Smart Agro combines the wisdom of the earth with the power of technology for more sustainable and high-performing agriculture.
landing.mission_p1: At Smart Agro, we believe every farmer deserves a precise view of their crops. Using cutting-edge IoT sensors and AI algorithms, we transform soil data into concrete decisions.
landing.mission_p2: Our goal is to maximize your yields while optimizing the use of natural resources like water and nutrients.

features.ai_desc: Precise predictions for every crop type.

footer.desc: The intelligent platform combining IoT and AI to maximize yields while preserving the environment.
